docs.snippet: Daktronics, in Brookings, S.D., has become one of the largest makers of sports video displays as teams try to recreate the living room experience in their parks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Daktronics, in Brookings, S.D., has become one of the largest makers of sports video displays as teams try to recreate the living room experience in their parks.
docs.abstract: Daktronics has become one of the largest manufacturers of giant LED video displays in sports arenas and stadiums, as teams attempt to recreate 'living room experience' for fans. Jacksonville Jaguars are among teams that have installed high-definition video boards in attempt to lure fans from their big screens at home.

headline.seo: Daktronics Plays Outsize Role as Giant Scoreboards Proliferate
